amendment.description: Amendment provides for an expansion of the Youth Gun Crime Interdiction Initiative to 75 city and county law enforcement agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 20 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to provide for the Secretary of the Treasury to expand the Youth Gun Crime Interdiction Initiative and require an annual report on the types and sources of recovered crime guns and the number of investigations associated with the initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
